column2: caption=Bingo Baggins from [[The Hobbit (2003 video game)

column1: '''Bingo Baggins''' (S.R. 1264-1360<!--"if you take the death date of Bingo Baggins in the Appendices, it should be 1360 but in most new copies of the book it is 1363."-->) was a [[Hobbits

Bingo was the youngest of the five children of [[Mungo Baggins]] and [[Laura Grubb]], and an uncle of [[Bilbo Baggins]]. He married [[Chica Chubb]], and their son [[Falco Chubb-Baggins]] was born in {{SR
In early manuscripts of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', the name ''Bingo'' was used of the character that would later be named ''[[Frodo Baggins
:Five portraits are clustered on a wall in [[Bag End]]. One of them is Bingo, and one of Bilbo's lines when looking at the portraits is "Good old Uncle Bingo".
